advantages_title: What are the advantages of being a Fastwork freelancer?
career_growth_description: Join Fastwork's testing and selection program to increase credibility and visibility on the system.
cta_title: Apply to be a freelancer on Fastwork now
freelance_types_title: What types of freelancers does Fastwork have?
freelancer_1: Apply today, provide your details, and become a freelancer within 48 hours.
freelancer_3: You can set your own price range based on the job suitability.
freelancer_5: Quotation system, create quotes and forms.
freelancer_professional_description: Multi-functional experts selected by Fastwork based on skills and portfolio.
freelancer_specialist_description: Experts who pass competency tests based on Fastwork’s professional standards.
freelancer_standard_description: Apply today. Show your details. Become a freelancer within 48 hours.
freelancer_types_title: What types of freelancers does Fastwork have?
increase_hiring: Increase your chances of getting hired
increase_hiring_description: We help make your job easier to find, whether on Google, Facebook, or other channels, increasing your chances of getting hired.
paperwork: No need to bother with paperwork
paperwork_description: Just fill in the job details, specify the duration, enter the price range, and the invoice will be generated automatically.
payment_security: Don't be afraid of not getting paid
payment_security_description: We act as a middleman to take care of your money when the job is completed. No need to worry about the employer not paying.
privileges_description: The more jobs you sell, the more access you will have to Fastwork's privileges and activities.
professional_2: Right to consult directly with professionals.
professional_3: Badge for Professionals, helping clients hire confidently through Fastwork.
professional_4: More opportunities from leading corporate clients through Fastwork.
sell_step_1_desc_prefix: Register with your ID and bank account ready for payment verification. Then you can start posting your service listings. Learn more with the
sell_step_2_desc: Prepare your portfolio and job description to showcase your skills. Our team will review and approve your listing within 48 hours.
sell_step_3_desc_suffix: to increase your chances of getting hired.
sell_step_4_desc: With Fastwork’s secure payment protection, you don’t need to worry about not getting paid. Work confidently and stress-free.
sell_step_5_desc: Submit your completed work for approval. Great work earns great reviews, increasing your credibility and chances of future sales.
sell_step_6_desc_prefix: Fastwork will transfer money to your bank account according to the
sell_step_6_desc_suffix: . The more you sell, the more benefits and exclusive opportunities you get.
sell_steps_title: 6 Easy Steps to Sell on Fastwork
specialist_1: Specialists who passed skill tests according to Fastwork standards.
specialist_2: Right to consult directly with the admin team.
specialist_3: Special opportunity to receive jobs from our partners.
specialist_4: Badge that identifies you as a specialist, helping customers hire with confidence through Fastwork.
step1_description: Register with your ID card and bank book ready to verify your identity. Then you can post your job ad. See how to use it.
step2: Post an ad for selling work
step2_description: Prepare your portfolio and job description to showcase your skills, then wait for the team to review and approve within 48 hours.
step3_description: Study freelance pricing techniques or use the Freelancer Center to learn how to increase your chances of getting hired.
step4_description: Be confident in every job! Fastwork guarantees to take care of your money. No need to worry about the employer not paying.
step5_description: Submit completed work for employer approval. The better the work, the more credibility it builds, increasing the chance of a sale.
step6_description: Fastwork transfers money to your bank account based on the payment terms. The more you sell, the more you earn.
steps_title: 6 easy steps to sell your work on Fastwork
subtitle: Freedom to work in the way you choose.
support_team_description: We are ready to help you immediately if there is a problem and will continue to develop the system to provide the best experience for you.
